# CORPlot

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of CORPlot is to create cumulative odds ratio plot to visually inspect the proportional odds assumption from the proportional odds model.

## Installation

You can install the development version of CORPlot from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("Yongxi-Long/CORPlot")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(CORPlot)
## basic example code
```
